state: -= Kitchen =- You've stumbled into a normal room. Your mind races to think of what kind of room would be normal. And then it hits you. Of course. You're in the kitchen. You start to take note of what's in the room. You can make out a closed refrigerator. You can make out a counter. You shudder, but continue examining the counter. But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk. You can make out a stove. Now why would someone leave that there? The stove appears to be empty. If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a kitchen island. The kitchen island is usual. On the kitchen island you make out a note. There is a closed screen door leading east. There is an open wooden door leading west. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the south. Your score has just gone up by one point. > -= Kitchen =-1/6
